Rainy_Day_0: The rain is watering the crops today.$1#$e#Ah, but of course you're going out anyway. It's the life of a farmer.
Rainy_Day_1: If your clothes get wet in the rain today, I'll be happy to wrap you up in warm blankets and snuggle you dry!$8
Rainy_Day_2: I think I'll stay inside today and practice cooking some of your favorites.$1
Rainy_Day_3: Good morning, love.$4#$e#It's raining out. Don't catch a cold!
Rainy_Day_4: Looks wet out there today. Don't you want to have a day in with me?
Rainy_Day_Sorren: I actually like the rain. Raindrops feel good falling on my face.$1
Rainy_Night_0: It was so quiet today. I'm glad you're home, sweetheart.$4
Rainy_Night_3: *yawn* Rainy days make me sleepy. Ready to turn in?$1
Rainy_Night_4: The rain sounds so peaceful on the roof. Come to bed, love.$4
Rainy_Night_5: I swept the floors and did the dishes today.$1#$b#Wanna reward me?$8
Rainy_Night_Sorren: It's been so dark all day, it makes me wanna light some candles.$4
Indoor_Day_0: Morning, love! Did you sleep well?$8#$e#Try not to work too hard.$1
Indoor_Day_2: Good morning, love.$4#$e#Are you ready for working the farm?$1
Indoor_Day_3: I couldn't do what you do with the farm. You've really brought this place to life, @.$8
Indoor_Day_4: I actually don't miss mining at all.#$e#Being a house husband really suits me.$4
Indoor_Day_Sorren: Have a good day today. Love you!$4
Indoor_Night_0: Did you have a productive day today?$1#$e#I'm in a cuddling mood. Let's go to bed early.$4
Indoor_Night_1: Hang on, @, you've got a little dirt on your face.#$b#There, got it... Are you blushing?$8
Indoor_Night_2: I got a lot of work done around the house today.$1#$e#What do you mean, there's not much to do?$5#$b#Well, okay, some of that 'work' was whittling...$3
Indoor_Night_3: Hey, sweetheart. Wanna have a glass of wine and stay up late?$4
Indoor_Night_4: Ready for bed? I sleep so well when you're lying next to me, @.$4
Indoor_Night_Sorren: Aw, you look tired. Let's go to bed, love.
Outdoor_0: Morning! It's a lovely day out, isn't it?$1
Outdoor_1: Anything I can do to help?#$e#Not that I'm that good at farm work...$3
Outdoor_2: Hello, love. Nice weather for farm work, huh?$1
Outdoor_3: What's cookin', good lookin'?$8#$b#Actually, I made lunch for you. Can't work on an empty stomach!$4 [198 202 204 214 240 241]
Outdoor_4: Hey sweetie, are you thirsty? Here.$1 [395]
Outdoor_Sorren: Think I should go do some mining?#$b#...Nah!$8
OneKid_0: I always wanted to be a dad, and now I am one!$8
OneKid_2: I don't mind taking care of %kid1 while you work.#$e#In fact, I think I prefer babysitting to mining.$1
OneKid_3: So many things have changed since our little one arrived.#$e#I wouldn't have it any other way.$4
TwoKids_0: I couldn't have asked for sweeter children than %kid1 and %kid2.$1
TwoKids_1: I'm going to do arts and crafts with the kids today.$1#$e#When you get home this evening, they can show you what they made!$8
TwoKids_2: Do you think the kids will be farmers too one day?#$e#Maybe one of them will take up whittling.$1
TwoKids_3: . . .$4#$b#Hm? Oh, I was just thinking how nice it is to have a family like this.$8
Good_0: I love being married to you. You're such a sweetheart, @.$4
Good_1: I love you, @.$4#$e#What, can't a man tell his spouse he loves them whenever he feels like it?$8
Good_2: Remember when I would barely talk to you at all?#$b#I can't imagine not talking to you now. I'm glad you took the time to get to know me.$4
Good_3: D-Did you just wake up looking like that?$3#$b#No, you look amazing! Like, I can't take my eyes off you amazing...$4
Good_4: You're so cute sometimes, you know that? I'm so lucky to be your husband.$4
Good_5: I want to spoil you rotten with good food and good... kisses.$8
Good_6: When you come home tonight, I'll give you a nice... long... backrub.$8
Good_7: You work so hard for us, @. Thank you... for everything.$4
Good_8: Don't stay out too long today, okay?#$e#I miss you when you're gone, you know.$4
Good_9: Hello, my love.$4#$b#Ooh, I feel all sappy today.$3#$b#You like it, though, don't you?$8
Neutral_0: Hmm, I wonder what I should have for lunch today...
Neutral_1: Are you happy, @?#$e#I hope you are happy...$3
Neutral_2: Don't work too hard, okay? I feel like I don't see you as much lately.
Neutral_3: *yawn* I think I might go take a nap.
Neutral_4: I burned breakfast this morning.$2#$b#Guess I wasn't paying enough attention.$3
Neutral_5: I'm getting a little stir-crazy lately.#$e#Maybe I should go take a walk in the woods.
Neutral_6: Are you tired today, too? No? Just me then.
Neutral_7: Seems like the housework never ends around here.
Neutral_8: Couldn't you stay home today?$3#$e#*sigh* No, you're right, the farm doesn't take a day off.$2
Neutral_9: The key to a successful relationship is communication.#$e#You know you can always talk to me, right?$3
Bad_2: It's been a while since we cuddled...$3
Bad_3: You won't leave me, will you? I don't think I could bear that.$2
Bad_4: . . . .$6#$e#S-Sorry, I'm just having a bad day today.$2
Bad_5: Please, just be honest with me, @.
Bad_6: You've been working so much lately that I never see you.$2
Bad_9: Why do I keep thinking about Theo's death?$2
spring_1: Happy New Year, sweetheart! Kiss me for good luck.$8
spring_8: Spring has sprung, as they say.#$b#Want me to get you some flowers?$4
spring_23: Go ahead and dance with someone at the festival tomorrow, if you want. I won't mind.#$e#You can come home and 'dance' with me afterwards.$4
summer_1: It'll be warm out now. Make sure you don't get heatstroke!
summer_8: Wanna go for a swim? Or how about a long, romantic walk on the beach?$4
summer_16: It's the anniversary of Theo's death today.$2#$e#But you know what? I think he'd be happy that I found you.$4
fall_1: It really feels like fall out now.#$e#I'm glad; summer is too hot.$1
fall_8: The orange and red leaves really make me want to go on a picnic in the forest.$1
fall_15: My birthday's coming up. Are you going to get me anything special?$3
fall_26: You go on to the festival without me, love. I prefer not to disturb the dead.
winter_1: I'm so ready for lots of snow! Aren't you?$1
winter_7: You gonna go fishing tomorrow for the contest? Knock 'em dead!$4#$e#Maybe bring back a couple for me to cook up, huh?$1
winter_28: It's been a wonderful year. I'm glad I got to spend it with you.$4#$e#To the new year! I got you a gift.$8 [348 243 337]
